mapper.insert: insert into alipay (out_trade_no, subject, total_amount, return_url, notify_url, product_code) values (#{outTradeNo}, #{subject}, #{totalAmount}, #{returnUrl}, #{notifyUrl}, #{productCode})
mapper.update: update alipay set trade_no = #{tradeNo}, app_id = #{appId}, buyer_id = #{buyerId}, seller_id = #{sellerId}, trade_status = #{tradeStatus}, receipt_amount = #{receiptAmount}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate}, gmt_payment = #{gmtPayment} where out_trade_no = #{outTradeNo}
